item.description:
Let's celebrate the beginning of the lovely month of May with great Italian food at Polcari's Restaurant, located just off Rt. 93 in Woburn!

Polcari's features a great assortment of Italian favorites, as well as famous Regina's Pizza! (yum)
Their Wedding Soup is very de-lish too!

This dinner is scheduled to follow the "My Fair Lady" musical theatre meetup in nearby Stoneham.

Even if you're not going to the play, please consider joining us for an evening of good food and good company!

Note: this meetup has also been posted with Meeting and Greeting in Southern NH and the Merrimack Valley, Northern Middlesex Singles, and The Boston/Providence Single Parents meetup groups.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in Lobby, or ask hostess for "Jill's group"

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Saturday evening Italian dinner in the North Suburbs!
